variants.Description in input context: homozygous W437X nonsense mutation in the PINK1 gene

Material used.Description: Mitochondrial respiration was measured in fibroblasts from patients with the PINK1 W437X mutation and healthy controls.

Readout description.Result Description: Fibroblasts with the PINK1 W437X mutation exhibited significantly reduced mitochondrial respiration (OCR) and increased mitochondrial membrane potential compared to controls.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent experiments were performed with fibroblasts from different patients.

Technical replicates.Description: Each experiment was repeated three times using the Seahorse XF analyzer.

Basic positive control.Description: Control fibroblasts from healthy individuals were used as positive controls.

Basic negative control.Description: Untreated fibroblasts without exogenous compounds were used as negative controls.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used to compare respiration rates between groups.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: OCR values within 10% of control fibroblasts

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: OCR values reduced by >20% compared to controls
